name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】Super Special Party Time! ３Dお披露目！#Kiara3DParty [q3Z9dPHKS3Q]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Kiara introduces the 'Serving Game' where she must recreate burger orders from memory.
Round 1: Kiara attempts to build a burger based on a shown pattern but fails to remember the exact sequence.
Round 2: Kiara tries a more complex pattern involving a drumstick and again fails, becoming frustrated.
Round 3: Kiara attempts to memorize the pattern out loud, but the physics of the game make it difficult to assemble.
